      • canGiveMarks

        public boolean canGiveMarks​(java.lang.String player,
                            int nMarks)
        Returns true only if a player can give n marks to this player. (Every player can only have 3 marks by another player)
        Parameters:
        player - The offender
        nMarks - The amount of marks
        Returns:
        true if player is allowed
